mapper.insert: insert into R_NEWADD_DOWNLOAD_KSYUN( statday, appid, channelid, serverid, ostype, clickcnt, cnt) values(#{lStatDay}, #{appId}, '*','*', '*',#{totalClickCount}, #{totalDownloadCount})
insert into R_NEWADD_DEVICE_KSYUN( statday, appid, channelid, serverid, ostype, cnt) values(#{lStatDay}, #{appId}, '*','*', '*',#{newActivateCount})
insert into R_NEWADD_ACCOUNT_KSYUN( statday, appid, channelid, serverid, ostype, cnt) values(#{lStatDay}, #{appId}, '*', '*', '*', #{newAccountCount})
mapper.delete: delete from R_NEWADD_DOWNLOAD_KSYUN where appid=#{0} and statday=#{1}
delete from R_NEWADD_DEVICE_KSYUN where appid=#{0} and statday=#{1}
delete from R_NEWADD_ACCOUNT_KSYUN where appid=#{0} and statday=#{1}
